name: Rover-Two
description:
A Puzzle game where you play as Rover-Two, a stranded rover who must recollect resources in an exotic archipelago of floating islands in space. You must discover all the secrets these islands hold before running out of fuel !

Controls

-WASD - Move

-Mouse - Camera Rotation

-Middle Mouse - Zoom In / Out
